Not quite such a productive day; zero words, but around 400 pairs of socks paired. Moltmann wasn't interested, either.
@triceratops1892 I am sorry that you feel like that'. But it is wrong for you to suggest intention. @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 Honest question: how would you say we can know God has spoken to us, if it is possible to know @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 Which is y its essential it is had. Its dangerous to think God might be speaking, when he isnt @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 lol, true, but at least give me a chance :) @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 It says God has now spoken definitively. His self-revelation complete @liambeadle @AliceGoodman17
@triceratops1892 So we need to do scholarship on people's claims? How? What's the standard? @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 of course it can be flawed - hence scholarship moving - but you haven't answered yet. @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 Then what is your method for verification? Mine is scholarly exegesis. @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 So, whenever someone says God has spoken to them we just say 'okay, fair enough'? @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 So, what are the other ways? What is the evidence/authority for believing them? @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 So - what are you proposing, then? @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 only, it wasn't. it was to affirm what Scripture teaches,& place that in the hands of many @AliceGoodman17 @liambeadle
@AliceGoodman17 I don't - I think the alternative is absolutely bizarre. @liambeadle @triceratops1892
@AliceGoodman17 No; people heard bits here and there in spoken word. @liambeadle @triceratops1892
@liambeadle the best way to be a Calvinist is to be an Anglican, obvs. @triceratops1892
@liambeadle Sound, mate. @God_loves_women @triceratops1892
@triceratops1892 'Reformed' is not exactly synonymous with 'Calvinist', they are related terms. @liambeadle @AliceGoodman17
@triceratops1892 Depends what you mean by Calvinism. @liambeadle @AliceGoodman17
@triceratops1892 I contest that rhe Reformed position relies on anything other than the sovereign grace of God @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 Even were that true,its a fallacy to say reasons for holding a position speaks to the validity of the position @liambeadle
@triceratops1892 Because he speaks to reveal himself. That is his purpose in revelation. @liambeadle @AliceGoodman17
@triceratops1892 @liambeadle @AliceGoodman17 Isn't it odd, that if God is chatty, he doesn't reveal some facts - like the cure for cancer
@triceratops1892 I'm not sure that the Reformed tradition suggests anyone is 'closer' to God. @liambeadle
